"Ah, my friend! You have the best timing: "I have a gift for you, my friend! Please, accept it with my blessing!"
"No no, you need not thank me! On the contrary, it is I who is thanking you!"
"So long, my friend! May we both enjoy a long and fruitful Summoner life!"
"Thank you for coming, my friend! It is not an exaggeration to say that this very moment is the beginning of your life as a Summoner!"
"I shall give you a present to start you on your lifelong Summoner journey! Take it, I insist!"
"From that egg, your beloved child will be born! The rest is simplicity itself - all you must do is lavish your love upon it!"
"I hope you will enjoy your Summoner life! Ah, how cute you are, my children..."

"Received <yellow><%skit_text><c> from Pietro."
"Why, it is my friend! What is it that troubles you? Please, do not hesitate to ask me anything!"
"...Hmm, have I made any additions to my dear children recently? Ones that look like girls in Halloween costumes?"
"Ah, unfortunately it was not I. I cannot even persuade my beloved children to embody my image."
"However, speaking from a position of expertise, that child would surely need love just as my own beloved children do."
"It must be so lonely to be thrust suddenly into this world, not even knowing right from left. Show her the love she needs, my friend!"
"Ah, do not say a word, I know that you have come to me because you wish to become a Summoner! Thank you for giving me your interest!"
"Well then, I shall explain Summoner to you!"
"Ah, my thanks for your interest! Have you heard of the new Class called Summoner?"
"No, no, I could not expect you to. I shall educate you on the wonderfulness of Summoner. That is why I called you over, after all."
"Now, permit me to explain Summoner to you in detail!"
"Next, I shall explain Pets, those lovable little ones who fight by your side!"
"These are all the basics you must know about Summoner."
"To celebrate the beginning of your journey, I will give you a present! Take it, I insist!"
"From that egg, your beloved child will be born! The rest is simplicity itself! All you must do is lavish your love upon it!"
"Well then, enjoy your new life as a Summoner! If you have questions, you may come to me at any time!"
"About Summoner"

"Summoner is a Class that uses \"Takt\" weapons to command \"Pets\" to battle enemies.

They can also cast Techniques and assist their Pets in battle.

Their ability to attack from long range lets them participate in battles with little risk to themselves."
"About Pets"

"Pets' abilities and PAs can be strengthened through Egg synthesis or by equipping Candy.

An experienced Summoner will prepare a number of Pets ahead of time and switch between them during a battle to maximise effectiveness."

"・Pet Registration
You can register new Pets by \"Using\" your \"Egg\" items.

To set up a Pet on your Weapon Palette, use the equipment menu
and equip a \"Takt\" weapon, then from the left to the right,
set your Pet in the following order:

・Favorite Pet (from your Pet list)
・Corresponding Pet PA (techniques)

When using a pet, your Mag presence will be hidden
but all the effects will be applied as usual."

"Ah, my children, how beautiful you are...
All the world's loveliness is as nothing next to your radiant beauty..."

"And how you clamor to cuddle with me!
I bear the scars of your love with a father's pride!"
"Ah, the simple pleasure of holding one's beloved children close... This is the joy that the Summoner Class brings!"
"I wish for you, too, to learn of the wondrous happiness to be found in fighting alongside your children!"
"Each of my children has its own special talents. Some are better at strking foes, while others, they favor Techniques."
"Which is best...? Ah, no no no, to make such a decision would be a cruelty most heinous! I love them all with equality!"
"There are some less sophisticated among ARKS who see Summoner's Takt as a weapon, but I tell you it is not so!"
"The Takt, it is a tool, a means to connect Summoner with child, permitting them to communicate."
"With it, Summoner and child's thoughts are as one, even in the heart of battle!"
"Ah, the love my childen feel for me is incomparable in its enormity!"
"With arms and heart open both, I gladly accept that love, no matter in what way they choose to express it!"
"One's children are not simple tools. One may find that at times, they behave in ways quite unpredictable."
"In fact, on occasion, they perform feats which surpass even my expectations!"
"Ah, my children, what secrets you still hold! To gaze upon their faces, knowing that their true power is yet to reveal itself... That is a joy without equal."

"If I am not very much mistaken, an embodied weapon is, to an Earthling, equivalent to one of my children!
To have broken one is unthinkable!"
"Ah, words cannot begin to describe the pain they must be feeling! Both this Earthling and their precious child!"
"It is said that the greatest hardships can often be a source of new strength! This is true for embodied weapons also!"
"And naturally, the same is true for Summoners! This is why I endure all the pain my children inflict upon me with stoicism unflinching"
"Ah, this Earth Guide leader... To have been unable to trust his own comrades; what a sad life he must have led."
"When one feels abiding love for others, and has the courage to defend them, almost any hardship can be endured..."
"Yes, exactly like my beloved children and myself! You understand perfectly what I mean, my friend!"
"My friend, we are in your debt once again! My children and I are at your disposal, should you ever need our help!"
"Ah, welcome back, my friend! My children also are overjoyed to see you!"
"Or perhaps I should say, when you were not around, they expressed to me their loneliness in terms unmistakeable! Truly, we are all glad to see you well!"
"Hello, my friend! I see you alone are still about a business most busy!"
"My children, too, express to me how worried about you they are! You may not be able to share what it is that occupies you, but be sure to not overstretch yourself!"
"Hello, my friend! Quite the situation we are in, are we not?!"
"Revenge is not the cry of one who intends to be nice! With that kind of mindset, what could ever satisfy her?"

"The only remedy for agony is to bring an equal amount of happiness to others!
...Ah, even my children are lamenting!"

"This threat from the unknown arouses everyone's anxiety...
It clouds their faces and fills their hearts with sighs!"
"Yet even at this time, you are cool as a cucumber, my friend! Yes, there is simply nothing that can frighten you! Ah, if only I saw as you do."
"I do not want my children to worry, so I am giving them even more love than usual!"

"Ah, I'm glad you are safe after what happened, my friend...!
My beloved children were crying, they were so worried!"
"No matter how much they destroy in their anger and hatred, our enemies will never be satisfied..."
"...If only love of the kind I feel for my children had been permitted in the Photoner era, how differently things might have gone."
"We were in a desperate situation, but your success has brought smiles back to the faces of my beloved children!"
"Thank you, my friend! My worry about my children was keeping me from sleeping at night. Their relief is second only to my own!"
"Hello, my friend! These busy times seem that they shall never end!"
"But I have no complaints! I can watch my beloved children go about their tasks so enthusiastically!"
"Just watching my children hard at work sweeps my fatigue away. You feel the same, do you not?"
"Ah, my beloved children! Each and every one of them is bursting with their own lovable personality!"
"For me, the chance to watch my children grow as they work hard is a treasure that is irreplaceable!"

"To protect this treasure...
I will spend every minute, every second that I can lavishing my love upon my children!"
"The end of this is before us! One final push will be all that it takes!"
"Even my children have expressions most serious upon their faces. We are all ready, you can depend upon it!"
"Let us fight for a world ruled by peace and love!"
"My friend, you have returned safely! My children and I are overjoyed to see you!"
"Now that our chains of sorrow are broken, I feel confident that everyone will come to see the importance of giving love to one another!"

"After so much pain and suffering, finally we have peace...
Regardless, I will continue to lavish my love upon my children every second of every minute of every day!"
